pending.heading: Profile Verification Pending
pending.thankYou: Thank you for submitting your profile! Your information is currently under review.
pending.processTime: This process usually takes 1-2 business days. We will notify you via email once your profile has been verified.
pending.meantime: In the meantime, you can check the status later or return to the homepage.

rejected.heading: Profile Verification Rejected
rejected.sorry: We're sorry, but your profile verification has been rejected. Please review the rejection reason below and update your profile accordingly.
rejected.afterUpdate: After updating your profile, our team will review your information again. You'll receive an email once your profile has been verified.
